dmca.title: VampireTemple complains text is being sucked out and pirated
dmca.body:
The copyrighted work at issue is our original work as SOLD by us IN PRINTED FORM ONLY to purchasers is www.vampiretemple.com and specifically http://www.vampiretemple.com/bible_html

The URL of the site I claim is using our 1989 registered copyright work is found by the search query: "vampire bible"

Search Query: vampire bible
Infringing Web Pages: http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3497968

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
[signed]
[private]
[private]
Lacey, WA 98509 www.vampiretemple.com 
[private]@vampiretemple.com
